nodes.text: A Bith male owned a refueling station on the bleak world of Orondia, a planet near Nal Hutta. His brother sold a ship to the trio of bounty hunters Cad Bane, Moralo Eval and Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as Rako Hardeen. He only put enough fuel in the ship to reach his brother's station on Orondia so they would both turn a profit. Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano pursued the bounty hunters to Orondia and the Showdown on Orondia ensued.
